name: Avocado Toast
ingredients: 1 ripe avocado, 2 slices of whole grain bread, salt and pepper to taste
instructions:
Toast the slices of bread until golden brown.
Mash the avocado in a bowl and season with salt and pepper.
Spread the mashed avocado evenly on the toasted bread slices.
Serve immediately.

name: Berry Yogurt Parfait
ingredients: 1 cup Greek yogurt, 1/2 cup mixed berries (strawberries blueberries, raspberries), 1/4 cup granola
instructions:
In a glass or bowl, layer Greek yogurt, mixed berries, and granola.
Repeat the layers until all ingredients are used up.
Serve immediatel as a delicious and nutritious breakfast option.

name: Caprese Salad
ingredients: 2 large tomatoes, sliced, 8 ounces fresh mozzarella cheese, sliced, 1/4 cup fresh basil leaves, 2 tablespoons balsamic glaze
instructions:
Toast the slices of whole wheat bread until golden brown. Spread peanut butter evenly on each slice of toast.
Arrange the thinly sliced banana on top of the peanut butter layer.
Drizzle with honey or maple syrup if desired, and sprinkle with chia seeds or sliced almonds for extra crunch.
Serve immediately and enjoy your delicious peanut butter banana toast!

name: Cucumber Hummus Bites
ingredients: 1 cucumber, Hummus, Cherry tomatoes, sliced in half. Optional toppings: feta cheese, olives, parsley
instructions:
Cut the cucumber into thick slices, about 1/2 inch thick.Using a small spoon or melon baller, scoop out a small portion of the center of each cucumber slice to create a well.
Fill each cucumber well with hummus.
Top each cucumber hummus bite with a slice of cherry tomato.
Add optional toppings such as crumbled feta cheese, sliced olives, or chopped parsley if desired.
Serve immediately and enjoy your refreshing Cucumber Hummus Bites!

name: Simple Scrambled Eggs
ingredients: 3 eggs, 2 tablespoons milk, salt and pepper to taste.
instructions:
Crack the eggs into a bowl, add milk, salt, and pepper, and whisk until well combined.
Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and pour in the egg mixture.
Stir the eggs gently with a spatula until they are cooked to your desired consistency.
Serve hot with toast or a side of fresh fruit

name: Banana Toast
ingredients: 2 slices of whole wheat bread, 2 tablespoons peanut butter, 1 ripe banana, thinly sliced. Optional: honey or maple syrup for drizzling Optional: a sprinkle of chia seeds or sliced almonds
instructions:
Toast the slices of whole wheat bread until golden brown.
Spread peanut butter evenly on each slice of toast. Arrange the thinly sliced banana on top of the peanut butter layer.
Drizzle with honey or maple syrup if desired, and sprinkle with chia seeds or sliced almonds for extra crunch.
Serve immediately and enjoy your delicious peanut butter banana toast!

name: Pesto Chicken Pasta
ingredients: 8 ounces pasta of your choice, 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, diced, 1/4 cup store-bought pesto sauce, 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese
instructions:
Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Drain and set aside.In a separate skillet, cook diced chicken until browned and cooked through, about 6-8 minutes.
Add cooked pasta to the skillet with chicken. Stir in pesto sauce and Parmesan cheese until everything is well coated and heated through.
Serve hot and garnish with additional Parmesan cheese, if desired.
Enjoy this flavorful pasta dish!

name: Veggie Stir-Fry
ingredients: 2 cups of mixed vegetables (such as bell peppers, broccoli carrots, and snap peas), chopped, 2 tablespoons of soy sauce, 1 tablespoon of sesame oil, 1 clove of garlic, minced
instructions:
Heat sesame oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Add minced garlic to the skillet and sauté for about 30 seconds.
Add mixed vegetables to the skillet and stir-fry until they are tender-crisp, about 5-7 minutes.
Pour soy sauce over the vegetables and toss to coat evenly.
Cook for another 1-2 minutes, then remove from heat.
Serve hot as a standalone dish or with cooked rice or noodles if desired.

name: Honey Pork Chops
ingredients: 4 pork chops, 3 tablespoons honey, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 2 tablespoons soy sauce
instructions:
Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a small bowl, mix together honey, minced garlic, and soy sauce.
Place pork chops in a baking dish and pour the honey garlic mixture over them, ensuring they're evenly coated.
Bake in the preheated oven for 15-18 minutes, or until pork chops are cooked through flipping halfway through cooking.
Serve hot and enjoy your flavorful Honey Garlic Pork Chops!

name: Fruit Salad
ingredients: Assorted fresh fruits (such as strawberries, blueberries, kiwi, pineapple, grapes), 2 tablespoons honey, 1 tablespoon lime juice
instructions:
Wash and prepare the fruits by slicing or chopping them into bite-sized pieces.
In a small bowl, whisk together honey and lime juice to make the dressing.
Arrange the mixed fruits in a serving bowl or platter.
Drizzle the honey-lime dressing over the fruits.
Garnish with fresh mint leaves if desired. Serve immediately or refrigerate until ready to serve.
Enjoy your refreshing and colorful Fruit Salad with Honey-Lime Dressing!

name: Oreo Cheesecake
ingredients: 1 package of Oreo cookies, 8 ounces cream cheese, softened, 1/4 cup powdered sugar, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, chocolate chips or chocolate candy melts for dipping (optional)
instructions:
Crush the Oreo cookies into fine crumbs using a food processor or blender.
In a mixing bowl, beat together softened cream cheese, powdered sugar, and vanilla extract until smooth.
Stir in the crushed Oreo crumbs until well combined.
Roll the mixture into small balls, about 1 inch in diameter, and place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Chill the Oreo cheesecake bites in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour, or until firm.
Optional: Melt chocolate chips or candy melts in the microwave and dip each chilled cheesecake bite into the melted chocolate.
Return the coated cheesecake bites to the refrigerator to set the chocolate.
Serve chilled and enjoy your delightful No-Bake Oreo Cheesecake Bites!
Leave it one hour to chill.
